text.*:
The following are lists of Indy Car (American Championship car) races from 1905 up to and including the 2018 season. The lists include IndyCar events sanctioned by the AAA, USAC, CART and IndyCar:

Contents

  • 1 2018 IndyCar season schedule
  • 2 Current IndyCar races and locations
  • 3 Former Indy Car races and locations
  • 4 Cancelled Indy Car races and locations
  • 5 Selected records
    • 5.1 All-time fastest races
      • 5.1.1 500 mile races
      • 5.1.2 All types and all tracks
    • 5.2 Closest finishes
      • 5.2.1 All races
      • 5.2.2 500 mile races
      • 5.2.3 Road courses
  • 6 References

Cancelled Indy Car races and locations[edit]

These races were cancelled during the IndyCar season for various reasons. This includes all sanctioning bodies.

Event Year Track Body Cancellation Reason
100-mile race 1916* Kalamazoo Fairgrounds AAA Cancelled after first-round eleven-car pileup, which left two racers dead and eight injured
1917/1918 Indianapolis 500 1917/18 Indianapolis Motor Speedway AAA Cancelled due to the United States entering World War I
1942 Indianapolis 500 1942 Indianapolis Motor Speedway AAA Cancelled as the United States entered World War II. Future races would remain halted for the next three years. The Indy 500 would return in 1946.
1980 USAC Championship Car season 1980 Texas World Speedway
Road Atlanta
Milwaukee Mile (second race)
Talladega Superspeedway
Canadian Tire Motorsport Park
Charlotte Motor Speedway 		USAC Six events cancelled as USAC started to unite with CART
Chicago Indy Grand Prix 1981 Streets of Chicago CART Announced in 1980 for a race the following year, however it never came into fruition
1999 VisionAire 500K 1999 Charlotte Motor Speedway IRL Cancelled after 79 laps due to spectator fatalities
Hawaiian Super Prix 1999 Kalaeloa Airport CART Cancelled by promoter at the last minute
Firestone Firehawk 600 2001 Texas Motor Speedway CART Cancelled after qualifying due to driver safety concerns
2003 King Taco 500 2003 Auto Club Speedway CART Cancelled due to the Old Fire natural disaster
Grand Prix of Seoul 2004 Streets of Seoul CART Cancelled due to track construction behind schedule
Grand Prix of Ansan 2005 Streets of Ansan CART Cancelled due to numerous delays
Champ Car China Grand Prix
Grand Prix Arizona
Grand Prix of Denver 		2007
Zhuhai International Circuit
Streets of Phoenix
Streets of Denver 		CART Announced but were never fulfilled mostly due to financial reasons
2008 Champ Car season 2008 All races except for three CART Champ Car / IndyCar reunification - Champ Car held its final race at the Grand Prix of Long Beach and the Indy Racing League added the Edmonton Indy and Surfer's Paradise to its 2008 schedule.
2011 IZOD IndyCar World Championship 2011 Las Vegas Motor Speedway INDYCAR Cancelled after 11 laps due to the death of Dan Wheldon
Indy Qingdao 600 2012 Streets of Qingdao INDYCAR Cancelled by promoters due to logistical reasons
Brasilia Indy 300 2015 Autódromo Internacional Nelson Piquet (Brasília) INDYCAR Cancelled by the newly elected Brazilian Socialist Party representatives
Grand Prix of Boston 2016 Boston Seaport District INDYCAR

*Non-championship race
